name: Quest for the Golden Cheese
description:
DISCLAIMER : This game was made using https://twinery.org/ and was not made using code or anything like that. As such, this game will not accept any form of money, as it is a simple passion project and nothing more. I encourage you to make your own, because it is relaxing, easy, and fun to make. Thank you.

"Quest for the Golden Cheese" is a text adventure where you-what else-quest for the golden cheese. Along the way you'll find plenty of references (and inside jokes that probably nobody will understand), and quite a few places to go. This game rewards exploring, but also risks ending your run, so watch out!
This game is not finished yet; the full game will include 20 endings and tons of wacky ways to lose. Currently, there are 15 endings.
